message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $10000. It's a premium item that I'm confident you'll love. I've had great feedback from other customers who have purchased it, and I think it will be a great addition to your collection. Would you like to take a chance on it?

I'm not making any exaggerated claims, but I am willing to offer it to you for the same price as before - $10000. Would you like to take a chance on it?
